channel.title: Linux award?
channel.description:
Well i see a number of people helping and stuff in the linux section, so i think its only right for them to be recognized for what they do, i don't want any of this "USELESS AWARD" crap, because we have the "IRC Legend" award that is totally useless.
So something like "Linux expert", "Linux [insert phrase/word that describes helping/good knowledge here l0l]" with the good old Linux penguin for the award with the text next to it :d. Oh yeah, don't ask me to make it because i am retarded with photoshop, GIMP and many other graphic programs, unless you want a paint creation l000000l.
I had another suggestion but i can't remember it now, but if i do then ill add it on :d

item.title: Linux award?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:11, topic:142283”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=194713.msg1749295#msg1749295 date=1189547861]
Certainly something like this would not be given to anyone who uses linux, but a similar award could be given to those who are extremely helpful in the Linux section. However we also have a Batman cup that could be applied to that.
[/quote]
How often do you give out help cups?
NOT SO OFTEN.
I’ve seen one(fairly) active person, mjordan.[/quote]

Well, it was supposed to be one of the more difficult cups to obtain, IIRC.

Read full topic

item.title: Linux award?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:6, topic:142283”]It’d be nice, I know one person who has helped me multiple times with it

but awards are like bleh[/quote]
In the end awards mean nothing yeah, but its good for newer people or just regular members to know what that person does, say if a new person came to the forum and needed help with linux they see this person with the linux award and they can ask him for help.

Same with the people holding the java cup, and all other cups.

Exception:

Yesh plz. Not that I’d ever get it…But good idea.

Yeah thanks.

Now before any of you people say something like this, no i am not suggesting this award so i can have it, because the fact i know little of linux, so i don’t think i will be able to offer much help on it.
and probably have the maximum of 5 posts in that section l0l.

Read full topic

item.title: Linux award?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Certainly something like this would not be given to anyone who uses linux

I don’t think i said that, then again you could be just saying it.

I was thinking the batman award was awarded to people who are helpful in most parts of the forum, when that could be hard for people as not everyone knows all the programming languages that people use on these forums, or SCAR for that matter.

So a linux award for people who have a good knowledge on linux distros or mainly just help around in that section alot.

Read full topic
